name: Modh & Vidhwani Associates
top_product: GST Advisory, GST Litigation and GST Compliance.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is an entrepreneur or business owner who is facing challenges with GST notices or struggling with GST compliance. Someone who values practical, long-term solutions over short-term fixes. I also welcome referrals from accountants or professionals who are looking to collaborate on assignment-based GST matters, where a deeper expertise is needed to resolve complex issues.
top_problem_solved: In GST advisory and litigation, every day brings a new challenge. But one case that truly stands out involved a Fortune 500 company that received a GST notice demanding ₹25 Crores, including interest and penalty. Initially, they engaged one of the Big 4 firms, who submitted a detailed 400-page reply. Yet, deep down, the client remained unsure and unsatisfied. That’s when I stepped in. With a combination of legal acumen and a gut instinct to challenge the core of the issue, I prepared a crisp, 8-page corrigendum that completely flipped the case. The demand was ultimately dropped. That moment still gives me goosebumps — not just because of the outcome, but because it reinforced my belief in clarity over volume, and results under pressure. It’s a memory I truly cherish.
my_favourite_bni_story: One interesting incident that stands out is when a friend from the support team of my BNI chapter approached me with a complex GST issue concerning his client. He had several misconceptions and was clearly stressed. I listened patiently, assessed the matter, and offered a professional solution—practical and cost-effective. The issue was resolved within just a few days. That one interaction not only converted into a closed business but also built a relationship based on trust. Today, he confidently refers me to others—even if it’s the middle of the night—because he knows I’ll deliver with clarity and commitment, especially in GST advisory and litigation.
